channel.title: Post your injury
channel.description: I thought i might post cuz peeps see if anyone has sweeeeeet scars lol.

item.title: Post your injury
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Oh, we can list our injuries?

Mad;
Broken shoulder, broken arm twice, chipped my knee cap, fractured my ankle, compressed vertebrates in my neck, cracked about 5 ribs, broken 3 toes, 2 fingers, umm… Oh, and my worst one, severely hurt my back.

Read full topic

@1337h4x wrote:

I’ve broken my hand, got attacked by a dog when I was 3 and have scars all over both of my hands the longest being 1cm to prove it, almost got my appendicox removed, my left eye is a -1 (I can only see for about 1 foot then everythings blury), and I severed my penis once.

@LegendaryLoser wrote:

jme_009:

I still have 3 scars from surgery once, although they are in my pubic area so I doubt you want to see them

odued u kut yor penus in haf?

I broke my little finger in second grade, when I was six I was hit by a bike half an inch from my eye. I have the scar to this day, just as bad as when it happened, twenty stitches in der.

item.title: Post your injury
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:3, topic:142295”]Well when i was 11 a piece of metal flung into my eye going right through the edge of my pupil (lucky miss :D) but yeah it went to the back and in the back of your eye ball there is this fluid and that was leaking through and i didnt notice for a few weeks and wasnt going to say anything about it but i just mentioned it to mum and she took me to the eye hospital and they said if i leave it i could go completely blind in that eye because the eye needs that fluid that is leaking out.

So they did an operation to stitch the hole on my eyeball shut with these (10) TINY little eye lash type stitches, a few weeks later 2 of them came loose and it hurt, SO bad so my mum took me to the hospital and they told me 2 of them was loose and i had a choice:
Either put me to sleep and take them out (would have to wait at least another 10 hours)
or they take them out while im awake, i chose the second don’t ask me why -.-.

But they had a nurse to old my head in this thing while the surgeon stuck this needle in my eye and pulled these 2 stitches out, and it hurt like fkin hell.

3 weeks later they put me to sleep and taken the remaining 8 out, and i was left with this small white scar just above my pupil for a few months (now its almost 5 - 6 years later all that is left is the top corner of my pupil is stretched up a bit, my vision is a bit blury in that eye and even in normal light i have to close my left eye because my pupil cannot close properly to the sun.

Oh forgot to mention the 4 different types of eye drops that i had to take every 2 hours for months and constant trips to the eye hospital, (i still have to go now 5-6 years on -.-)

Anyway ill try get someone to take a picture of my eye so you can see the pupil (bit stretched in the corner)so you can see.

Forgot to mention cracked my head open, broke all my knuckles on my left hand broke my middle finger on my left hand, broke my right shoulder.

Theres a good few more but meh, can’t be bothered listing.[/quote]
omfg, thug life that got to hert so damn much

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injury
item.dc:creator: @zbizzle1337 zbizzle1337
item.description:
@zbizzle1337 wrote:

I have tons of scars on my wrist from slashing them…

Yes that’s not true, but I was making a bagel 5 years ago (5th grade) and I wanted to cut it in half. Unfortunately it was frozen, and I was stupid enough to try and cut it without letting it thaw first. The knife decides to slip onto my finger and goes in pretty deep, like a 1/4 thickness of my finger. Sharp knife waah O.O

Read full topic

item.title: Post your injury
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well when i was 11 a piece of metal flung into my eye going right through the edge of my pupil (lucky miss :D) but yeah it went to the back and in the back of your eye ball there is this fluid and that was leaking through and i didnt notice for a few weeks and wasnt going to say anything about it but i just mentioned it to mum and she took me to the eye hospital and they said if i leave it i could go completely blind in that eye because the eye needs that fluid that is leaking out.

So they did an operation to stitch the hole on my eyeball shut with these (10) TINY little eye lash type stitches, a few weeks later 2 of them came loose and it hurt, SO bad so my mum took me to the hospital and they told me 2 of them was loose and i had a choice:
Either put me to sleep and take them out (would have to wait at least another 10 hours)
or they take them out while im awake, i chose the second don’t ask me why -.-.

But they had a nurse to old my head in this thing while the surgeon stuck this needle in my eye and pulled these 2 stitches out, and it hurt like fkin hell.

3 weeks later they put me to sleep and taken the remaining 8 out, and i was left with this small white scar just above my pupil for a few months (now its almost 5 - 6 years later all that is left is the top corner of my pupil is stretched up a bit, my vision is a bit blury in that eye and even in normal light i have to close my left eye because my pupil cannot close properly to the sun.

Oh forgot to mention the 4 different types of eye drops that i had to take every 2 hours for months and constant trips to the eye hospital, (i still have to go now 5-6 years on -.-)

Anyway ill try get someone to take a picture of my eye so you can see the pupil (bit stretched in the corner)so you can see.

Forgot to mention cracked my head open, broke all my knuckles on my left hand broke my middle finger on my left hand, broke my right shoulder.

Theres a good few more but meh, can’t be bothered listing.

Read full topic
